name: datepicker
description: * Given the HTML (`index.html`), CSS (`styles.css`), JavaScript (`scripts.js` and `jquery.min.js`) build a jQuery plugin for a simple datepicker control * _The datepicker must:_   * Be built from a simple text input tag   * Show a calendar with the current month - the calendar should always show 6 rows of data and fill the empty spaces with the previous and next month's dates   * Allow the user to navigate to the previous and next months   * Allow the user to select a date from the calendar   * Always show at the bottom the current date
